thread.section_title: The Orange County Register - News Headlines : Sports
thread.title: Mistakes doom USC at Notre Dame in Clay Helton's debut
thread.title_full: Mistakes doom USC at Notre Dame in Clay Helton's debut

author: MICHAEL LEV
title: Mistakes doom USC at Notre Dame in Clay Helton's debut
text: Mistakes doom USC at Notre Dame in Clay Helton's debut Oct. 17, 2015 Updated 10:35 p.m. 1 of 24 USC running back Justin Davis is tackled by Notre Dame's Jaylon Smith during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. USC lost, 41-31 to drop to 3-3 overall. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame quarterback DeShone Kizer is tackled by USC linebacker Su'a Cravens during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC quarterback Cody Kessler looks to throw as he is pressured by Notre Dame's Joe Schmidt (Mater Dei) during the first half in South Bend. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame quarterback DeShone Kizer is tackled by USC defensive back Chris Hawkins during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame's Josh Adams is tackled by USC defensive back Adoree' Jackson during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster makes a reception in front of Notre Dame's KeiVarae Russell during the first half Saturday in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame's Torii Hunter Jr. fumbles as he is tackled by USC defensive back Adoree' Jackson just outside the goal line during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. Chris Hawkins is at left. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC quarterback Cody Kessler runs 3 yards for a touchdown against Notre Dame's Isaac Rochell during the first half Saturday in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC's Adoree' Jackson runs for an 83-yard touchdown after catching a short pass during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC interim head coach Clay Helton watches during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC quarterback Cody Kessler throws downfield during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC's Alex Wood, right, is congratulated by Zach Banner after Wood kicked a 42-yard field goal during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC receiver Darreus Rogers runs with the ball as Notre Dame's Joe Schmidt (Mater Dei) tries to bring him down during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. Rogers later aggravated a hamstring injury. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame quarterback DeShone Kizer is tackled by USC's Marvell Tell III, left, and Leon McQuay III during the second half. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame quarterback DeShone Kizer is tackled by USC defensive back Marvell Tell III during the second half. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC running back Tre Madden finds room to run during the first half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame's Corey Robinson makes a 10-yard touchdown catch while being defended by USC freshman defensive back Iman Marshall during the second half. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame head coach Brain Kelly watches during the second half of Saturday's game in South Bend, Ind. Notre Dame won, 41-31. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame's Corey Robinson makes a 10-yard touchdown catch while being defended by USC freshman defensive back Iman Marshall during the second half. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC freshman running back Ronald Jones II is tackled by Notre Dame's KeiVarae Russell, left, and Cole Luke after a long run during the second half. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame's Justin Yoon, right, celebrates with his teammates after he kicked a 32-yard field goal during the second half. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame's Max Redfield, right, celebrates after his interception during the fourth quarter of his team's 41-31 victory over USC on Saturday night in South Bend, Ind. Redfield is a former USC recruit from Mission Viejo High. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 Notre Dame's Max Redfield, right, a former USC recruit from Mission Viejo High, celebrates with Joe Schmidt (Mater Dei) after Redfield made a game-clinching interception during the second half of a 41-31 victory over USC. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 24 USC quarterback Cody Kessler is hugged by interim head coach Clay Helton following their 41-31 loss to Notre Dame on Saturday night in South Bend, Ind. DARRON CUMMINGS, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
